title: Top 10 Generative AI Tools Every Product Manager Needs in 2025
description: Explore the top 10 generative AI tools for product managers in 2025, from Perplexity for research to Grok for ideation. Atiq Israk, a Bangladesh PM, shares how these tools drove 20% user acquisition in SaaS projects.

author.name: Atiq Israk
author.bio: Generative AI Product Manager at Ether Technologies | Built NAVBOT & MAVE CMS AI integrations | Driving 160% revenue growth through AI in SaaS & FinTech | Dhaka, Bangladesh

content.introduction: Generative AI is reshaping product management. From drafting PRDs to market research, tools like Perplexity, Grok, and Gemini are must-haves. As a PM in Bangladesh, I used these tools to boost user acquisition by 20% in MAVE LMS. Here’s my curated list of the top 10 AI tools for PMs in 2025.

sections.body: AI tools save time, enhance insights, and scale impact. My AssetIQ project used Perplexity to cut research time by 40%. Here’s why PMs need these tools...
